name: Helpless...Alone...Afraid...
description: Helpless...Alone...Afraid... is a game where you and three friends are going on a trip to a mountain cabin. One of your friends tells a little story on the way up about an evil clown that's said to stalk the mountains and kill unwanted guests. Are these legends true? Find out in my new horror, visual novel adventure, "Helpless...Alone...Afraid..."
